我是在看不出“那是美國人的事阿　別人法治國家水平這麼高”体现在哪里，美国童子军都因为性侵被人告破产了...

不是在今年出生而是在今年内将有40万在美国出生的儿童被SA。且SA的定义很宽泛。比如你妈妈帮你拍裸照也算。Child sexual abuse includes:•any sexual act between an adult and a minor, or between two minors, when one exerts power over the other.1•forcing, coercing or persuading a child to engage in any type of sexual act.1•non-contact acts such as exhibitionism, exposure to pornography, voyeurism, and communicating in a sexualmanner by phone or Internet.
